data.lyric:
[ti:Rap Devil (Explicit)]
[ar:Machine Gun Kelly]
[al:Rap Devil (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]RAP DEVIL (Explicit) - Machine Gun Kelly (机关枪凯利)
[00:11.57]Oh my god Ronny
[00:12.57]Ayy somebody grab him some clippers zzzzt
[00:14.71]His f**kin' beard is weird
[00:16.45]Tough talk from a rapper payin' millions for security a year
[00:19.65]I think my dad's gone crazy yeah Hailie you right
[00:22.92]Dad's always mad cooped up in the studio yellin' at the mic
[00:26.00]You're sober and bored huh I know
[00:27.72]About to be 46 years old dog
[00:29.57]Talkin' 'bout I'ma call up trick trick
[00:31.20]Man you sound like a b***h b***h
[00:32.57]Man up and handle your s**t ugh
[00:34.09]Mad about somethin' I said in 2012
[00:35.82]Took you six years and a surprise album just to come with a diss
[00:38.94]Homie we get it we know that you're the greatest rapper alive
[00:42.05]F**kin' dweeb all you do is read the dictionary and stay inside
[00:44.87]F**k rap god I'm the rap devil
[00:46.38]Comin' bare-faced with a black shovel
[00:47.93]Like the armageddon when the smoke settle
[00:49.70]His body next to this instrumental I'm sayin'
[00:51.69]I'm sick of them sweatsuits and them corny hats let's talk about it
[00:54.72]I'm sick of you bein' rich and you still mad let's talk about it
[00:58.08]Both of us single dads from the midwest we can talk about it
[01:01.15]Or we could get gully I'll size up your body
[01:02.90]And put some white chalk around it
[01:04.36]Let's talk about the fact you actually blackballed a rapper
[01:06.27]That's twice as young as you let's talk about it
[01:07.72]Let's call sway
[01:08.28]Ask why I can't go on shade 45 because of you brrt
[01:10.80]Let's ask interscope
[01:11.75]How you had paul rosenberg tryin' to shelf me huh
[01:14.06]Still can't cover up the fact
[01:15.22]Your last four albums is as bad as your selfie
[01:16.76]Now tell me what do you stand for what
[01:18.86]I know you can't stand yourself no
[01:20.58]Tryin' to be the old you so bad you stan yourself ha
[01:23.45]Let's leave all the beefin' to 50 please
[01:25.31]Em you're pushin' 50
[01:26.85]Why you claimin' that I'ma call puff
[01:28.55]When you the one that called diddy facts
[01:30.21]Then you went and called jimmy facts
[01:31.76]They conference called me in the morning what
[01:33.41]They told me you mad about a tweet
[01:34.86]You wanted me to say sorry what
[01:36.49]I swear to god I ain't believe him nah
[01:38.13]Please say it ain't so no
[01:39.76]The big bad bully of the rap game can't take a f**kin' joke
[01:42.85]Oh you want some f**kin' smoke what
[01:44.49]But not literally you'll choke
[01:45.90]Yeah I'll acknowledge you're the GOAT
[01:47.26]But I'm the gunner b***h I got you in the scope brra
[01:49.38]Don't have a heart attack now no
[01:51.01]Somebody help your mans up help
[01:52.58]Knees weak of old age the real slim shady can't stand up
[01:55.56]I'm sick of them sweatsuits and them corny hats let's talk about it
[01:58.73]I'm sick of you bein' rich and you still mad let's talk about it
[02:02.08]Both of us single dads from the midwest we can talk about it
[02:05.26]Or we could get gully I'll size up your body
[02:06.84]And put some white chalk around it
[02:08.39]Hello marshall my name's colson
[02:10.24]You should go back to recovery
[02:11.63]I know your ego is hurtin'
[02:12.83]Just knowin' that all of your fans discovered me hi
[02:15.00]He like d**n he a younger me
[02:16.36]Except he dresses better and I'm ugly
[02:17.70]Always making fun of me
[02:18.97]Stop all the thuggery marshall you livin' in luxury d**n
[02:21.19]Look what you done to me
[02:22.18]Dropped an album just because of me
[02:23.33]D**n you in love with me
[02:24.20]You got money but I'm hungry
[02:25.27]I like the diss but you won't say them lyrics out in front of me
[02:27.46]Shout out to every rapper that's up under me
[02:29.02]Know that I'll never do you like this f**kery
[02:30.85]Still bitter after everyone loves you
[02:32.67]Pull that wedgie out your dungarees hey
[02:34.14]I gotta respect the ogs and I know most of 'em personally ayy
[02:37.36]But you're just a bully actin' like a baby
[02:38.84]So I gotta read you a nursery nursery
[02:40.68]I'm the ghost of the future
[02:42.01]And you're just ebenezer scrooge facts
[02:43.65]I said on flex anyone could get it
[02:45.27]I ain't know it would be you
[02:46.61]I'm sick of them sweatsuits and them corny hats let's talk about it
[02:49.94]I'm sick of you bein' rich and you still mad let's talk about it
[02:53.33]Both of us single dads from the midwest we can talk about it
[02:56.43]Or we could get gully I'll size up your body
[02:58.17]And put some white chalk around it
[03:00.44]Ridin' shotty 'cause I gotta roll this dope
[03:02.92]It's a fast road when your idols become your rivals yeah
[03:06.85]Never hesitate to say it to your face I'm a a*****e
[03:10.52]B***h-a*s motherf**ker
[03:11.26]Oh my god Ronny
[03:12.39]We know you get nervous rabbit
[03:13.55]I see momma's spaghetti all over your sweater
[03:15.34]I wish you would lose yourself on the records
[03:16.87]That you made a decade ago they were better
[03:18.46]Accordin' to them you're a national treasure
[03:20.46]To me you're as soft as a feather
[03:21.60]The type to be scared to ask Rihanna for her number
[03:23.70]Just hold her umbrella-ella-ella
[03:25.24]I'm not afraid okay oscar the grouch chill on the couch f**k
[03:28.65]You got an oscar d**n
[03:29.77]Can anyone else get some food in their mouth for real
[03:31.84]They made a movie about you you're in everybody's top ten
[03:34.77]You're not getting better with time
[03:36.09]It's fine Eminem put down the pen
[03:38.07]Or write an apology
[03:39.01]Over the simple fact you had to diss to acknowledge me
[03:41.31]I am the prodigy
[03:42.20]How could I even look up to you you ain't as tall as me
[03:44.58]5'8 and I'm 6'4 seven punches hold your head still
[03:47.80]Last time you saw 8 mile was at home on a treadmill
[03:50.99]You were named after a candy
[03:52.56]I was named after a gangster brr
[03:54.12]And don't be a sucker and take my verse
[03:55.63]Off of yelawolf's album thank you thank you
[03:57.46]I just wanna feed my daughter
[03:58.59]You tryna stop the money to support her
[04:00.28]You the one always talkin' 'bout the action
[04:01.75]Text me the addy I'm pullin' up scrappin'
[04:03.45]And I'm by my f**kin' self what's happenin'
[04:05.01]EST captain salute me or shoot me
[04:06.55]That's what he's gonna have to do to me
[04:07.79]When he realizes there ain't s**t he could do to me
[04:10.18]Everybody always hated me this isn't anything new to me
[04:13.35]Yeah there's a difference between us
[04:14.63]I got all of my shit without dre producin' me ayy
[04:16.41]I know you're not used to me
[04:17.68]Usually one of your disses should ruin me
[04:19.62]But b***h I'm from cleveland
[04:20.59]Everybody quiet this evenin' I'm readin' the eulogy shh
[04:22.92]Dropped an album called kamikaze
[04:24.57]So that means he killed him
[04:25.97]Already f**ked one rapper's girl this week
[04:28.07]Don't make me call kim
[04:29.17]I'm sick of them sweatsuits and them corny hats let's talk about it
[04:32.49]I'm sick of you bein' rich and you still mad let's talk about it
[04:35.71]Both of us single dads from the midwest we can talk about it
[04:38.84]Or we could get gully I'll size up your body
[04:40.51]And put some white chalk around it
data.trans:
[ti:Rap Devil (Explicit)]
[ar:Machine Gun Kelly]
[al:Rap Devil (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:11.57]//
[00:12.57]谁给他拿把剃须刀来吧
[00:14.71]他的胡子实在太奇怪了
[00:16.45]放狠话的这个说唱歌手 每年花在安保上的费用都有好几百万美金
[00:19.65]我觉得我爹是疯了吧 Hailie 你说得对
[00:22.92]我爹总是一个人把自己关在录音室里发疯 对着麦克风狂吼
[00:26.00]你很清醒 也很无聊 我知道
[00:27.72]都快46岁的人了
[00:29.57]还总说 我要把我兄弟Trick Trick叫来
[00:31.20]兄弟 你的话听起来就像个碧池
[00:32.57]兄弟 还是管好你自己的事吧
[00:34.09]还在因为我2012年说的一些话生气
[00:35.82]你花了六年的时间 外加一张空降专辑 就为了诋毁我
[00:38.94]兄弟 我们明白了 我们知道你是当今最伟大的说唱歌手
[00:42.05]书呆子 你整天就知道翻字典 不停地看
[00:44.87]什么说唱之神 我可是说唱恶魔
[00:46.38]来的时候没戴面具 手里拿着一把黑铲子
[00:47.93]就像世界末日一样 硝烟弥漫 
[00:49.70]他的身体就倒在乐器旁边 我是说
[00:51.69]我烦透了他们老穿运动套装 戴着农夫帽 我们聊聊这事吧
[00:54.72]我不想看到你变成富翁了火气还这么大 我们聊聊吧
[00:58.08]我们两个都是来自美国中西部的单身父亲 我们可以好好聊聊
[01:01.15]或者我们可以暴力一点 我会把你干掉
[01:02.90]在你尸体周围用白色粉笔画上一圈
[01:04.36]让我们来聊聊你封杀我的那件事
[01:06.27]那时的我还太年轻 年龄差不多是你的一半 我们聊聊这事
[01:07.72]我们打电话给Sway Calloway吧
[01:08.28]问问凭什么就因为得罪你 我就不能上Shade 45频道了
[01:10.80]我们去问问唱片公司
[01:11.75]你是怎么让Paul Rosenberg封杀我的
[01:14.06]事实是无法掩盖的
[01:15.22]你近几年的四张专辑和你的自拍一样烂
[01:16.76]现在 告诉我 你代表着什么
[01:18.86]我知道 你也受不了你自己
[01:20.58]才会努力做回从前的你 你也变成了自己的脑残粉
[01:23.45]这些口舌功夫就留给50 Cent吧
[01:25.31]你也年近50了啊
[01:26.85]你为什么说我要给Puff Daddy打电话
[01:28.55]而事实上 你才是那个给他打电话的人
[01:30.21]而且你又打给了Jimmy Iovine
[01:31.76]他们大早上起来给我打了电话会议
[01:33.41]说你因为一条推文发脾气了
[01:34.86]你想让我给你道歉
[01:36.49]我发誓 我没有信他
[01:38.13]告诉我 事情不是这样的
[01:39.76]你这个说唱界一霸竟然连这样一个小玩笑都开不起吗
[01:42.85]你想来根烟吗
[01:44.49]但是你会窒息的 我没夸张
[01:45.90]我承认你一直都是说唱界的大神
[01:47.26]但我可是神枪手 碧池 我已经通过瞄准器锁定你了
[01:49.38]你现在可别心脏病发作啊
[01:51.01]谁来扶着你站起来吧
[01:52.58]年纪大了 膝盖发软 你的歌《the real slim shady》一蹶不振了
[01:55.56]我烦透了他们老穿运动套装 戴着农夫帽 我们聊聊这事吧
[01:58.73]我不想看到你变成富翁了火气还这么大 我们聊聊吧
[02:02.08]我们两个都是来自美国中西部的单身父亲 我们可以好好聊聊
[02:05.26]或者我们可以暴力一点 我会把你干掉
[02:06.84]在你的尸体周围用白色粉笔画上一圈
[02:08.39]你好 Marshall 我叫Colson
[02:10.24]你应该回到发行《Recovery》时的状态
[02:11.63]我知道伤了你的自尊
[02:12.83]你知道你的粉丝们都发现了我的才华
[02:15.00]他好像在说 他居然比我年轻
[02:16.36]另外 他的穿着还比我好看 我太难看了
[02:17.70]还总是取笑我
[02:18.97]别再干坏事了 Marshall 你活得那么奢侈
[02:21.19]看看你对我做了什么
[02:22.18]还特意为了我发行一张专辑
[02:23.33]你不是爱上我了吧
[02:24.20]你不愁钱 我却还挨着饿
[02:25.27]我喜欢挑恤 但你不敢当着我的面唱出这些歌词 
[02:27.46]问候所有地位不及我的说唱歌手们
[02:29.02]要知道 我可不会像这样为难你们
[02:30.85]每个人都爱你 你还活得那么痛苦
[02:32.67]把你工装裤下藏着的女靴露出来啊
[02:34.14]我会尊重这些行业大佬 里面大部分人我私底下都认识了
[02:37.36]但你这个大佬的行为就像个小孩子
[02:38.84]所以我要把你送到托儿所
[02:40.68]我是未来之魂
[02:42.01]而你只是Ebenezer Scrooge
[02:43.65]我在Funk Flex Freestyle节目里说过了 任何人都有可能成功
[02:45.27]但我没想到是你
[02:46.61]我烦透了他们老穿运动套装 戴着农夫帽 我们聊聊这事吧
[02:49.94]我不想看到你变成富翁了火气还这么大 我们聊聊吧
[02:53.33]我们两个都是来自美国中西部的单身父亲 我们可以好好聊聊
[02:56.43]或者我们可以暴力一点 我会把你干掉
[02:58.17]在你的尸体周围用白色粉笔画上一圈
[03:00.44]坐在副驾驶上 因为我要卷一根**
[03:02.92]当你的偶像变成了你的对手时 你就得走快车道了
[03:06.85]就算当着你的面我也敢说 我是个混蛋 
[03:10.52]是个碧池
[03:11.26]//
[03:12.39]我们知道你很紧张 Rabbit
[03:13.55]我看到你的毛衣上沾满了妈妈做的意大利面
[03:15.34]我希望你能沉醉于
[03:16.87]你十年前制作的专辑里 那可比最近的好多了 
[03:18.46]人们都说你是国宝
[03:20.46]在我看来 你太软弱了
[03:21.60]我看你连蕾哈娜的电话号码都不敢去要吧
[03:23.70]就躲在她的伞下吧
[03:25.24]我不害怕 好吧 你就像Oscar the Grouch一样  在沙发上冷得发抖
[03:28.65]你竟然获得了奥斯卡大奖
[03:29.77]还能不能让其他人混口饭吃了
[03:31.84]人们还拍了一部关于你的电影 你是人们心中的十佳说唱歌手之一
[03:34.77]但是在岁月的沉淀下 你并没有越来越好
[03:36.09]没关系 Eminem 放下你的笔
[03:38.07]或者写一封道歉信
[03:39.01]关于这个再简单不过的事实 你必须写一些话来承认我
[03:41.31]我是个天才
[03:42.20]你长得都没有我高 还怎么让我仰视你呢
[03:44.58]你身高5'8英尺 我6'4 七拳打过来 你脑袋可得挺直了
[03:47.80]你回不去老家了 上次看见8英里还是在跑步机上吧
[03:50.99]你这名字是学人家糖果名取的吧
[03:52.56]我的名字可是根据一个匪徒名来的
[03:54.12]别那么过分  
[03:55.63]把我的歌从Yelawolf的专辑里删掉 谢谢
[03:57.46]我只想养活我的女儿
[03:58.59]你却要断了她的抚养费来源
[04:00.28]你嘴上总说着要行动
[04:01.75]把地址发给我 我要杀个片甲不留
[04:03.45]我就靠我自己一个人 怎么了
[04:05.01]大家都集合了 长官 要么向我致敬 要么开枪打死我
[04:06.55]这就是他要对我做的
[04:07.79]当他意识到他拿我没办法的时候
[04:10.18]所有人都讨厌我 我一点都不觉得奇怪
[04:13.35]没错 我们之间还是有区别的
[04:14.63]没有Dr. Dre当制作人 我也能自己出作品
[04:16.41]我知道你不习惯我
[04:17.68]正常来说 你随便带个节奏就能毁了我
[04:19.62]但是碧池 我来自克利夫兰
[04:20.59]今晚 大家都安静下来了 我在念悼词
[04:22.92]发行了一张叫做《kamikaze》的专辑
[04:24.57]意思是 这张专辑能干掉你
[04:25.97]这周已经拿下了某个说唱歌手的女朋友
[04:28.07]别逼我打电话给Kim
[04:29.17]我烦透了他们老穿运动套装 戴着农夫帽 我们聊聊这事吧
[04:32.49]我不想看到你变成富翁了火气还这么大 我们聊聊吧
[04:35.71]我们两个都是来自美国中西部的单身父亲 我们可以好好聊聊
[04:38.84]或者我们可以暴力一点 我会把你干掉
[04:40.51]在你的尸体周围用白色粉笔画上一圈
